    • Server

      public Server() throws java.io.IOException
      Allocates a new Server object and initialize serverSocket
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if cannot initialize the ServerSocket

  • Method Details

    • insertInWaitingList

      public boolean insertInWaitingList​(ClientSocketConnection connection, java.lang.String nickname)
      Check if a nickname is already in use and if it's not, add them in waitingNameList
      Parameters:
      connection - the ClientSocketConnection of the player
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      Returns:
      true if the nickname is not in the waitingNameList or playingNameList, false otherwise

    • looserDisconnect

      public void looserDisconnect​(java.lang.String playerToKill)
      Disconnect playerToKill from the server and remove it from playingList and playingConnections
      Parameters:
      playerToKill - the player to disconnect from the server

    • killLobby

      public void killLobby​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Method called when an exception occurred in the ClientSocketConnection of nickname or the game is ended. If the nickname is still in the waitingNameList then it is removed, otherwise disconnect all the player in the same game of nickname and remove them from the playingList and playingConnections
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to disconnect

    • lobbyForTwoPlayer

      public void lobbyForTwoPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, ClientSocketConnection connection)
      Insert the new nickname and connection in waitingListForTwo and if the waiting list is full initialize a new game otherwise send a WaitMessage to connection
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      connection - the ClientSocketConnection of the player

    • lobbyForThreePlayer

      public void lobbyForThreePlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, ClientSocketConnection connection)
      Insert the new nickname and connection in the waitingListForThree and if the waiting list is full initialize a new game otherwise send a WaitMessage to connection
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      connection - the ClientSocketConnection of the player

    • start

      public void start()
      Accept all the new connection and launch a thread for the new ClientSocketConnection
